snippet: Don’t turn our public retirement plans into vehicles for gun policy.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Boston College professor Alicia H Munnell contends that public pension plans should not be used to make political statements, as was case when Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel asked boards of city's public plans to end investments in gun companies in wake of Newtown, Conn, shooting.
lead_paragraph: Don’t turn our public retirement plans into vehicles for gun policy.

headline.main: A Pension for Security, Not Politics
headline.print_headline: A Pension for Security, Not Politics
